resources.string: This is the night! The village goes to sleep!
Morning! Let\'s proceed to the eliminations
Day time! Chat and speak about what to do!
Dinner is served! But watch out, these villagers are alive… so are their enemies…
Do you wish to delete this role?
Do you wish to reset all the roles and delete the ones you created?

Select if it\'s a solo role or not. Solo means it\'s neither in the villager team, neither the werewolves even if it\'s one. Can influence some mechanisms on the application if it\'s not a solo role. (Ancient remove powers)
Select if the role must wakes up at night or not.
Select if the role is a werewolf or not.
Enter what would be the key to get your role. You can\'t put the "NORMAL" and "AUTHOR" keys.

What kind of power has your role : 
PERMANENT : Constant role. Apply also for no power. 
CONSUMABLE : The role can be consumed during the game. You will be able to change the awakening at night in the dedicate view. Note that if your character must starting waking up later, you have to configure it to not wake up at night basically. 
CONDITIONAL : Will have an evolution depending the condition on the next dropdown. 
UNIQUE : Once your character is called at night, he falls asleep. That means it only works on characters that wake up at night.

What is the condition of your character? You must have choose a power CONDITIONAL to affect this parameter : 
NOCONDITION : Default configuration. Used for non conditional powers. 
ONEWEREWOLF : Your character wakes up or not when one werewolf is dead. 
ONEVILLAGER : Same condition but when one villager is dead. 
ALLWEREWOLVES : Same condition but when there is no more werewolves in the game. 
ALLVILLAGERS : Same condition but when there is no more non-solo villagers. 
LINKEDROLES : When the roles with their version you link on the associate part are dead. 
ISALONE : When your role is the only one left. Only works on roles that have multiple occurrences.

Check or unchecked the roles you want linked to your role. Each link is named from a combination of the role name and its version. Note that your role with links will "try to play at the same time as the others". If you want to create a new werewolf that also a second turn, do not link to werewolves but put it as a werewolf.
Write the text that will be displayed when your role is called at night. If it\'s a day role, you can write what you want it will not appear.
Give the description of your role
Describe what your role is supposed to do. It will be the main identity of your creation.
What is in one sentence this application?
This application is a mobile software helper to animate your games of werewolves.
Start a game, select the characters you want to put in the game and let\'s go!
I can start a game without werewolves, why?
This allows you to play the "black death" variant where there is no werewolves. Be sure to read the manual about it.
What the hell? Why the calls aren\'t in the order of the manual ?

The application allows you to custom your call order. If you want to start with the werewolves, you can! If you are disturbed, be sure to use the buttons on the select screen to re-order your characters.
Simple roles linked to the werewolves will follow on the order change (like the Wolf Father). This can also concern the little girl in normal mode.
Why the white werewolf and the big bad wolf don\'t follow ?
They don\'t follow so that they can play their special turn. Pay attention that the application always call the white wolf on every turn instead of 1 turn on 2.
What\'s this about the version of a character?

Werewolves of miller\'s hollow isn\'t a fair and balanced game; but it also has some roles that aren\'t fun at all. In order to have every role funny, lot of them have a special version I (the author) created and tested in game with good returns!

The normal Thief doesn\'t have any value in the app since the player who has this character choose a character not yet in the game. Specially for this, I suggest you put the two roles into your selection and start the game, but you remove the Thief and the non-selected character when you can.
Your Thief is strange… what is this version with traps?

My thief with traps is inspired from fantasy worlds where thief are master in this domain. Try it, you can be surprise how it\'s fun for the players! Note well which trapped has been used and who is the target! For the ambient, I also invite you to be creative when you have to play a trap that is noisy or "hurtful"

The normal Actor is call every night in order to play for 1 turn to play 1 of the 3 roles you prepared separately. Once he has used all of them, you can go to the role window and deactivate him there. Note that you don\'t need to add the three roles you putted aside in the app; you can handle it like normal.
I can do everything I want about the characters in this app!

Yes, you\'re the master after all! You can animate your game as you wish and this app helps you to do it! The game isn\'t handle by it, this is just a helper ;). The app only stops you when you don\'t have any characters in the game.
How can I play your special Servant through your app?

This role is one of my favorite and complex one. To play it, you need simple villagers. But don\'t remove yet the special villagers in the app until the servant is dead. If you want to update the list of characters alive, remove a simple villager instead. When the supposed role is called, pass it. Also don\'t update yet the consumable statement of some roles.

The normal Big Bad Wolf doesn\'t have its special turn when a werewolf die. The white wolf doesn\'t have its special turn when he\'s the last werewolf in the game. If your normal wolf hound wakes up, activate his awakening in the role window. The same apply for the Wild Child when his mentor dies. Brothers and sisters aren\'t called anymore when they are the last one.

It\'s a special place where you can put all important information to remember like the lovers, who is protected etc… There are also some information to store about some new actions we gave to the deaths like switching places two players (not their roles!), punish one or multiple players (make them turn their back during the day only). It\'s considered as a curse of the dead werewolves. You can be creative on these concepts if you want.
What is the role window you spoke about ?

It\'s a special place where you can control the call of some characters depending the evolution of the game. If everybody for example knows the witch has used its two potions, it\'s useless to call her again. You can stop her call of the night there. Every role that can have an evolution is listed there. Watch out on some roles that have the reverse evolution; meaning they don\'t wake up at the beginning but might later like the wild child.
How is handle the infected by the wolf father? What happened if it is the last werewolf ?

The application doesn\'t handle the infected. I suggest you don\'t forget for now the werewolves\'turn if it is the last one; maybe not remove the last "true werewolf card" in the app until the infected dies. How it was conceive is in order so the infected continue to play normally but wakes up at the werewolves\'s turn.
I can\'t valid the creation of my role; why?
You need to fulfill all the data in order for the button to be enable. Note also that you can\'t create a key type of "NORMAL" or "AUTHOR" since it\'s hardcoded keys.
If you want to modify a role you created, you just need to enter the same category key and the application will update your previous version.
Note on the change of language :

When you change language, all the roles you have created will not be available. Each time you create a role, it will be associated to the list specific of your language. If you want to have your new role on another language, you need to create it again. Why is it in this way? That\'s from choices of architecture.
Where can I contact you for any questions?
You can send me an e-mail on my address : kevin.prudhomme555@gmail.com. Please use a tag like [Werewolf] at the subject so that it catch my attention ;)
